item.title: Holy Aesthete : painting a virtual wall
item.description: Today, it’s the day of Holi, the festival of colors in India. Yesterday, it was the end of our midterm exams. Such Time. Much Rhyme. Virtual Wall During the last minutes, I decided to stop writing after matching an answer with the person sitting next to me. I was all set to run outside the hall and smell the woot! no more exams left scent in the air.
